text.section: If the applicant for a license is a firm, the firm shall appoint a firm member as the representative member to make the application on behalf of the firm.

To qualify for a license, if an applicant is an individual, an applicant shall:
be at least 18 years old; and
be of good moral character.

To qualify for a license, if the applicant is a firm, each firm member shall be:
at least 18 years old; and
of good moral character.
The applicant shall meet any other requirements that the Secretary establishes for license applicants.
